    		Office of Graduate Studies
    	Thank you for helping to make our Giving Day campaign successful!Thank you to all of our donors who made a gift to the Pipeline to Success Fund during Giving Day! Your generosity will help provide first-generation, low-income, and other underserved undergraduate and graduate students the opportunity to reach their full potential through educational advancement and professional achievement. Thank you for helping us with our commitment to achieving academic distinction and prominent scholarship and for supporting transformative student experiences!Earn a master’s degree from Chico State. CSU, Chico offers more than 25 graduate studies programs. Explore this site to find a master’s program that interests you, get help applying, or find other useful graduate school information.

With one of the lowest average student debt amounts in the country, Chico State offers one of the nation’s highest return on investment.Apply to Chico StateAsk an AdvisorWe’re eager to assist you!Application & Requirements AdvisingGet help applying to a master’s program at Chico State through CalState Apply.Topics: academic requirements, application deadlines, transcripts.(Click here for fall 2022 drop-in assistance link.)Graduate Program CoordinatorsGet details about your program of interest from a academic specialist.Topics: courses, requirements, career paths, research opportunities.International Student AdvisingFor all international student applicants.Search for More Information and ResourcesSearch Graduate StudiesSearchAbout UsStaff DirectoryGraduate Faculty ProfilesSummer ServicesAbout CampusPaths with PurposeGraduate Academic Program ReviewProgram PortfolioFor Incoming StudentsNew Student OrientationGraduate Studies GuidesSigning Up for ClassesSteps toward Earning the Master's DegreeMore for StudentsCouncil of Graduate StudentsGraduate ProgressionGraduate School FairInterdisciplinary Studies Master's ProgramThesis or ProjectPoliciesProceduresActivitiesFormattingWriting TipsScholarWorks(opens in new window)ScholarWorks FAQAdditional Information & ResourcesAcademic Probation/DisqualificationTranscriptsReplacement DiplomaGrad Student/Faculty Success StoriesStudent Research CompetitionPast Student Presenters2023 Top Presenters2022 Statewide CompetitionOffice of Graduate Studies530-898-6880graduatestudies@csuchico.eduSupport the UniversityProgram Portfolio 
	
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
